Examples

This section provides practical examples of how to use the CFSpy package for various computations related to Chen-Fliess series.

Lotka-Volterra

 1 from CFS import iter_int, iter_lie, single_iter_int, single_iter_lie
 2
 3 import numpy as np
 4 from scipy.integrate import solve_ivp
 5 import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
 6 import sympy as sp
 7
 8 # Define the Lotka-Volterra system
 9 def system(t, x, u1_func, u2_func):
10     x1, x2 = x
11     u1 = u1_func(t)
12     u2 = u2_func(t)
13     dx1 = -x1*x2 +  x1 * u1
14     dx2 = x1*x2 - x2* u2
15     return [dx1, dx2]
16
17 # Input 1
18 def u1_func(t):
19     return np.sin(t)
20
21 # Input 2
22 def u2_func(t):
23     return np.cos(t)
24
25 # Initial condition
26 x0 = [1/3,2/3]
27
28 # Time range
29 t0 = 0
30 tf = 3
31 dt = 0.001
32 t_span = (t0, tf)
33
34 # Simulation of the system
35 solution = solve_ivp(system, t_span, x0, args=(u1_func, u2_func), dense_output=True)
36
37 # Partition of the time interval
38 t = np.linspace(t_span[0], t_span[1], int((tf-t0)//dt+1))
39 y = solution.sol(t)
40
41 # Define the symbolic variables
42 x1, x2 = sp.symbols('x1 x2')
43 x = sp.Matrix([x1, x2])
44
45
46 # Define the system symbolically
47 g = sp.transpose(sp.Matrix([[-x1*x2, x1*x2], [x1, 0], [0, - x2]]))
48
49 # Define the output symbolically
50 h = x1
51
52 # The truncation of the length of the words that index the Chen-Fliess series
53 Ntrunc = 4
54
55 # Coefficients of the Chen-Fliess series evaluated at the initial state
56 Ceta = np.array(iter_lie(h,g,x,Ntrunc).subs([(x[0], 1/3),(x[1], 2/3)]))
57
58 # inputs as arrays
59 u1 = np.sin(t)
60 u2 = np.cos(t)
61
62 # input array
63 u = np.vstack([u1, u2])
64
65 # List of iterated integral
66 Eu = iter_int(u,t0, tf, dt, Ntrunc)
67
68 # Chen-Fliess series
69 F_cu = x0[0]+np.sum(Ceta*Eu, axis = 0)
70
71 # Graph of the output and the Chen-Fliess series
72 plt.figure(figsize = (12,5))
73 plt.plot(t, y[0].T)
74 plt.plot(t, F_cu, color='red', linewidth=5, linestyle = '--', alpha = 0.5)
75 plt.xlabel('$t$')
76 plt.ylabel('$x_1$')
77 plt.legend(['Output of the system','Chen-Fliess series'])
78 plt.grid()
79 plt.show()
